name: Modern Space Race
description:
Help Elon Must return to mars before it's too late!

We made this game in under 48 hours for a charity game jam! Follow the link below to support AbleGamers.

https://tinyurl.com/GMJ21Fundraiser

All proceeds go towards AbleGamers, a charity dedicated to creating communities and accessibility tools for gamers with disabilities. Be sure to include this game in your donation so we can win the "Most Fundraised" award!
